properties.Name: ClaimAppraisal
properties.Description: A survey to determine a property's insurable value, or the amount of a loss.

Columns.Name: AppraisalId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Appraisal.

Columns.Name: AppraisalStatement
Columns.Description: The reporting statement regarding the Appraisal .

Columns.Name: AppraisalNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the Appraisal .

Columns.Name: AppraisalByPartyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Party.

Columns.Name: ClaimId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Claim.
